alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 8:48PM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River near Pine City affecting Pine County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Prairie River near Taconite affecting Itasca County. Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Morrison and Crow Wing Counties. Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Aitkin and Crow Wing Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and remains forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Aitkin. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Pumping begins at the wastewater treatment plant. Sandbagging begins at Aitkin city transformer. Water tops the levees on the North side of Aitkin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 15.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CDT Monday was 15.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.8 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.1 feet on 04/26/1979. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Aitkin 13.0 15.8 Mon 7 pm CDT 16.0 16.2 16.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon by 400 PM CDT.
